languages.text: "Я счастлив! А теперь, думаю, пора возвращаться к разговору о печальной реальности, в которой мы сейчас находимся..."
"I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."
languages.original_text: "Я счастлив! А теперь, думаю, пора возвращаться к разговору о печальной реальности, в которой мы сейчас находимся..."

traits.locale_text: "I am delighted! And now, I believe it is high time we returned to discussing the circumstance we find ourselves in, which is far from delightful..."
"I am delighted! And now, I believe it is high time we returned to discussing the circumstance we find ourselves in, which is far from delightful..."
"I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances we currently find ourselves in..."
"I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances we currently find ourselves in..."
"I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."
"I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."

languages.text: «¡Qué maravilla! Y ahora, creo que debemos retomar la discusión sobre las circunstancias nada agradables en las que nos encontramos actualmente...».
languages.original_text: "I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué maravilla! Y ahora, creo que debemos retomar la discusión sobre las circunstancias nada agradables en las que nos encontramos actualmente...».

languages.text: "Ich bin entzückt! Und nun ist es wohl höchste Zeit, dass wir wieder über die wenig erfreulichen Umstände sprechen, in denen wir uns augenblicklich befinden ..."
languages.original_text: "I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin entzückt! Und nun ist es wohl höchste Zeit, dass wir wieder über die wenig erfreulichen Umstände sprechen, in denen wir uns augenblicklich befinden ..."

languages.text: « Vous m'en voyez ravi ! Et maintenant, je crois qu'il est grand temps de reprendre notre discussion quant à la situation peu réjouissante dans laquelle nous nous trouvons... »
languages.original_text: "I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'en voyez ravi ! Et maintenant, je crois qu'il est grand temps de reprendre notre discussion quant à la situation peu réjouissante dans laquelle nous nous trouvons... »

languages.text: “真是个令人开心的好消息！至于现在，咱们还是谈谈目前这个不太理想的环境吧……”
languages.original_text: "I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."

traits.locale_text: “真是个令人开心的好消息！至于现在，咱们还是谈谈目前这个不太理想的环境吧……”

languages.text: 「俺も嬉しいよ！さて、そろそろ我々が直面している、決して楽しいとは言えない状況について話し合うとしよう…」
languages.original_text: "I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."

traits.locale_text: 「嬉しいな！今こそ俺達が置かれている、楽しいとはかけ離れた現状について話す頃合いかな…」
「俺も嬉しいよ！さて、そろそろ我々が直面している、決して楽しいとは言えない状況について話し合うとしよう…」

languages.text: "Çok hoşuma gider! Lakin artık, içinde bulunduğumuz hiç de hoş olmayan koşulları tartışmaya dönmemizin tam zamanı olduğuna inanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am delighted! And now, I believe it's high time we returned to discussing the far-from-delightful circumstances in which we currently find ourselves..."

traits.locale_text: "Çok hoşuma gider! Lakin artık, içinde bulunduğumuz hiç de hoş olmayan koşulları tartışmaya dönmemizin tam zamanı olduğuna inanıyorum."
